body:
If Avicus is still going in 5 years, which I really hope it does, what does everyone think it is going to be like? Take these into consideration:


The amount of players that will be on Avicus
Who will be the new Moderators and Directors, and Managers?
Will there be different gamemodes?
Will there be tons of new maps?

Try and think about these and other factors - what will Avicus be in 5 years!

iBiZa_MiNeCrAfT

title: [QUESTION] Avicus in 5 Years

replies.body: None. It'll likely be gone.
replies.body_tagged: None. It'll likely be gone.

replies.body:
If Avicus does survive for another 5 years it will have completely changed. The current Staff Team will have most likely been completely updated because most people will have continued with their lives. 

However, if Avicus did survive there would be more players because it wouldn't have survived otherwise. These new players will have probably been attracted to the server through different, new, exciting game modes. If there are different game modes, there will be different maps!

We have just got to hope that Avicus does survive! I don't really want to have to say goodbye to the lovely community that keep Avicus running!
replies.body_tagged:

We have just got to hope that Avicus does survive! I don't really want to have to say goodbye to the lovely community that keep Avicus running!

replies.body: Honestly, do you expect an elego game to be still around even after 3 years? Even if it is, it won't be as popular as it is right now. With a sudden decline of people leaving due to being bored, irl stuff, etc, minecraft will be much more different. The population of minecraft will probably go to 100k maybe 80k, and then suddenly decline. This includes xbox players and pocket edition users

replies.body:
The amount of players that will be on Avicus: 2500 

Who will be the new Moderators and Directors, and Managers? I can't say because I'm very sure new people will join and apply. But players like Fluenza_, izjust4fun and more staff from skywars.co (Lol I don't know if jozz was playing at skywars.co [same for izzy]) will be for ever. <3

Will there be different gamemodes? Yes, Avicade will be fixed and Ivy and the new developers are going to add more minigames.

Will there be tons of new maps? I hope, the old, great maps will survive... but of course will there be more maps! I think about 150 which will be accepted!

replies.body:
To be honest, I don't know.
I have played here for a while, and watched people come and go, I was active in forums once, but now, not so much.  With player count averaging near 100-150, Avicus seriously needs to get the 1.8 update out.  If Avicus is still going in five years, congrats to them (notice 'them').  I personally like the community, even though few of you remember me (thanks to those who did).  The [future] community will be very different than what it is now.  Heck, as someone said earlier, we don't even know what is going to happen to Minecraft.  

Probably not going to post anything for another two months...
